title: Game client not working.
body: On the game client in the top left corner it says 0% 1 of 1 as in its downloaded but I can't play the game because it says its still downloading. I don't know how to fix this so if anyone does could you please help.

replies.body: If this is still happening then a hiccup with your network might be preventing updates from being downloaded.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help!
